Package fr.badblock.bungee.modules.abstracts

Class BadCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Command
      • fr.badblock.bungee.modules.abstracts.BadCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminChatCommand, AdminCommand, AlertCommand, BrohoofCommand, ChatFriendCommand, ChatStaffCommand, EndCommand, FriendCommand, GListCommand, HelpCommand, OpCommand, PartyCommand, PluginsCommand, SendCommand, VerCommand
    public abstract class BadCommand
extends net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Command
    Abstract class that makes it easier to create commands on the server without actually having to save them.
    Author:
    xMalware
